tasks.title: Code Review and Architecture Assessment
tasks.description: Review existing codebase and assess current architecture, identify improvement areas, and plan enhancements
tasks.details: Analyze the existing IT Management System codebase including server.js, client.html, html.html, and data.json. Assess current features, identify technical debt, security vulnerabilities, and areas for improvement. Document current architecture and plan enhancement strategy.
tasks.testStrategy: Create comprehensive documentation of current system state, identify all improvement opportunities, and prioritize enhancement roadmap.

tasks.title: Database Migration and Enhancement
tasks.description: Migrate from JSON file storage to proper database and enhance data management
tasks.details: Migrate existing JSON-based data storage to SQLite database with proper schema design. Create migration scripts to transfer existing tickets, users, and assets data. Implement proper database relationships, constraints, and indexing for better performance and data integrity.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all existing data is successfully migrated, database queries perform efficiently, and data integrity is maintained.

tasks.title: Authentication System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing authentication system with improved security and user management
tasks.details: Enhance the existing email OTP authentication system with JWT tokens, improved session management, and role-based access control. Add password-based authentication option, user registration, password reset functionality, and enhanced security measures including rate limiting and input validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced authentication flows, security measures, and ensure backward compatibility with existing OTP system.

subtasks.title: JWT Token Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement JWT token generation, validation, and management for enhanced authentication
subtasks.details:
- Add JWT library (jsonwebtoken) to package.json
- Create JWT token generation for both admin and client users
- Implement token validation middleware
- Add token refresh functionality
- Ensure backward compatibility with existing session-based auth

subtasks.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
subtasks.description: Implement role-based access control system with different user roles and permissions
subtasks.details:
- Define user roles (admin, client, support, manager)
- Create role-based middleware for route protection
- Implement permission checking for different operations
- Add role assignment and management functionality
- Update database schema to support roles

subtasks.title: Password Authentication System
subtasks.description: Add password-based authentication alongside existing OTP system
subtasks.details:
- Implement password hashing with bcrypt
- Create password registration and login endpoints
- Add password reset functionality with email verification
- Implement password strength validation
- Ensure OTP system remains as alternative authentication method

subtasks.title: User Registration System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive user registration with validation and verification
subtasks.details:
- Create user registration endpoints
- Implement email verification for new registrations
- Add user profile management functionality
- Create user account activation/deactivation
- Implement user data validation and sanitization

subtasks.title: Enhanced Security Measures
subtasks.description: Implement additional security features and hardening measures
subtasks.details:
- Add two-factor authentication (2FA) support
- Implement account lockout after failed attempts
- Add IP-based rate limiting and blocking
- Implement session timeout and automatic logout
- Add security audit logging for authentication events

tasks.title: API Server Enhancement and Security
tasks.description: Enhance existing Express.js server with improved security, error handling, and API structure
tasks.details: Enhance the existing Express.js server with improved middleware, better error handling, request validation, rate limiting, CORS configuration, and security headers. Restructure API endpoints for better organization and add comprehensive logging and monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify enhanced server security, improved error handling, and all existing functionality continues to work properly.

tasks.title: User Management System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance user management with improved CRUD operations and role-based permissions
tasks.details: Enhance existing user management functionality with improved CRUD operations, role-based permissions, user profiles, and administrative tools. Add user registration, profile management, and enhanced admin interface for user management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced user management features, role-based access control, and admin interface functionality.

subtasks.title: Enhanced User CRUD Operations
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive user CRUD operations with validation and error handling
subtasks.details:
- Create enhanced user creation with validation
- Implement user update operations with role-based restrictions
- Add user deletion with soft delete option
- Create user search and filtering functionality
- Implement bulk user operations for admins
- Add user import/export functionality

subtasks.title: User Profile Management System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive user profile management with extended user data
subtasks.details:
- Create user profile data structure with additional fields
- Implement profile update functionality
- Add profile picture upload and management
- Create user preferences and settings
- Implement profile privacy controls
- Add user activity history and statistics

subtasks.title: Role and Permission Management
subtasks.description: Implement advanced role and permission management system
subtasks.details:
- Create role management interface for admins
- Implement custom role creation and editing
- Add granular permission assignment
- Create permission inheritance system
- Implement role-based access control (RBAC) UI
- Add permission audit logging

subtasks.title: Admin User Management Interface
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive admin interface for user management
subtasks.details:
- Create admin dashboard for user management
- Implement user list with search and filtering
- Add user detail view with full profile information
- Create user activity monitoring interface
- Implement user account status management
- Add admin audit trail for user operations

subtasks.title: User Analytics and Reporting
subtasks.description: Implement user analytics and reporting functionality
subtasks.details:
- Create user activity analytics dashboard
- Implement user registration and login statistics
- Add user engagement metrics
- Create role-based usage reports
- Implement user performance tracking
- Add exportable user reports

tasks.title: Ticket Management System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing ticket management system with advanced features and improved workflow
tasks.details: Enhance the existing ticket management system with advanced features including file attachments, ticket templates, SLA management, escalation rules, and improved workflow automation. Add bulk operations, advanced filtering, and enhanced reporting capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced ticket management features, file attachments, SLA compliance, and workflow automation.

subtasks.title: File Attachments System
subtasks.description: Implement file attachment functionality for tickets including upload, storage, and download capabilities
subtasks.details:
- Add file upload support to ticket creation and updates
- Implement secure file storage with proper validation
- Add file download and preview functionality
- Support multiple file types (images, documents, etc.)
- Add file size limits and type restrictions

subtasks.title: Ticket Templates System
subtasks.description: Create predefined ticket templates for common issues to speed up ticket creation
subtasks.details:
- Create template categories (hardware, software, network, etc.)
- Implement template selection and customization
- Add template management interface for admins
- Support template variables and placeholders
- Allow template import/export functionality

subtasks.title: SLA Management and Escalation Rules
subtasks.description: Implement Service Level Agreement tracking and automatic escalation rules
subtasks.details:
- Define SLA timeframes for different priorities
- Implement automatic escalation based on time thresholds
- Add SLA violation tracking and notifications
- Create escalation workflow and notifications
- Add SLA reporting and compliance metrics

subtasks.title: Bulk Operations System
subtasks.description: Implement bulk operations for ticket management including mass updates and actions
subtasks.details:
- Add bulk status updates for multiple tickets
- Implement bulk assignment to technicians
- Add bulk priority changes
- Create bulk export functionality
- Add bulk delete with confirmation
- Implement bulk template application

subtasks.title: Advanced Filtering and Search
subtasks.description: Enhance ticket filtering and search capabilities with advanced options
subtasks.details:
- Add advanced search with multiple criteria
- Implement date range filtering
- Add priority and status filtering
- Create assignee and requester filtering
- Add category and department filtering
- Implement saved search filters
- Add search result export functionality

subtasks.title: Enhanced Reporting and Analytics
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive ticket reporting and analytics dashboard
subtasks.details:
- Create ticket volume and trend reports
- Add SLA compliance reporting
- Implement technician performance metrics
- Add category and priority distribution reports
- Create resolution time analytics
- Add customer satisfaction tracking
- Implement real-time dashboard updates

tasks.title: Frontend Interface Modernization
tasks.description: Modernize existing frontend interface with improved UX and responsive design
tasks.details: Modernize the existing HTML/CSS/JavaScript frontend with improved user experience, better responsive design, modern UI components, and enhanced accessibility. Update client.html and html.html with modern design patterns, better mobile support, and improved user interface.
tasks.testStrategy: Test modernized interface across different browsers and devices, verify improved UX and accessibility compliance.

subtasks.title: Modern CSS Framework Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate a modern CSS framework like Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap 5 for improved styling and responsive design
subtasks.details: Replace the current custom CSS with a modern framework to improve maintainability, responsiveness, and design consistency. This will provide better mobile support and modern UI components.

subtasks.title: Component-Based Architecture
subtasks.description: Refactor the frontend to use a component-based architecture with reusable UI components
subtasks.details: Break down the monolithic HTML structure into reusable components. Create modular components for forms, tables, modals, and navigation. This will improve maintainability and allow for better code organization.

subtasks.title: Enhanced User Experience Features
subtasks.description: Implement modern UX features including loading states, animations, and improved form interactions
subtasks.details: Add loading spinners, smooth transitions, form validation feedback, toast notifications, and improved error handling. Implement skeleton loading states and progressive enhancement for better user experience.

subtasks.title: Accessibility Improvements
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive accessibility features including ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support
subtasks.details: Add proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation support, focus management, color contrast improvements, and screen reader compatibility. Ensure WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for better accessibility.

subtasks.title: Mobile-First Responsive Design
subtasks.description: Implement mobile-first responsive design with improved mobile navigation and touch interactions
subtasks.details: Redesign the interface with mobile-first approach, implement hamburger menu for mobile, optimize touch targets, improve mobile form interactions, and ensure proper scaling across all device sizes.

tasks.title: Advanced Dashboard and Analytics
tasks.description: Enhance existing dashboard with advanced analytics and reporting capabilities
tasks.details: Enhance the existing dashboard with advanced analytics, real-time metrics, performance KPIs, and comprehensive reporting. Add interactive charts, data visualization, export capabilities, and custom report generation. Implement SLA tracking and performance monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify enhanced dashboard displays accurate real-time data, all analytics work correctly, and reporting functions properly.

subtasks.title: Real-Time Metrics and KPIs
subtasks.description: Implement real-time metrics dashboard with key performance indicators
subtasks.details: Create real-time data visualization for ticket metrics, response times, SLA compliance, user activity, and system performance. Add live updating charts and performance indicators

subtasks.title: Interactive Data Visualization
subtasks.description: Create interactive charts and data visualization components
subtasks.details: Implement interactive charts (line, bar, pie, donut), data tables with sorting/filtering, heatmaps, and trend analysis. Add zoom, pan, and drill-down capabilities

subtasks.title: SLA Tracking and Performance Monitoring
subtasks.description: Implement SLA tracking and performance monitoring dashboard
subtasks.details: Create SLA compliance tracking, response time monitoring, escalation alerts, performance trends, and automated SLA reporting with breach notifications

subtasks.title: Custom Report Generation
subtasks.description: Implement custom report generation and export capabilities
subtasks.details: Create report builder with customizable templates, scheduled reports, multiple export formats (PDF, Excel, CSV), email delivery, and report sharing functionality

subtasks.title: Advanced Analytics and Insights
subtasks.description: Implement advanced analytics with predictive insights and trend analysis
subtasks.details: Add predictive analytics, trend forecasting, anomaly detection, correlation analysis, and actionable insights with recommendations for process improvement

tasks.title: Knowledge Base System Implementation
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive knowledge base with search and content management
tasks.details: Implement a comprehensive knowledge base system with article creation, categorization, advanced search functionality, and content management. Include rich text editor, file attachments, FAQ management, and solution templates. Integrate with ticket system for automatic solution suggestions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test knowledge base search accuracy, content management features, and integration with ticket system.

tasks.title: Asset Management System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing asset management with advanced tracking and lifecycle management
tasks.details: Enhance the existing asset management system with advanced features including hardware/software inventory tracking, license management, maintenance scheduling, asset lifecycle management, barcode scanning integration, and asset-ticket correlation. Add asset discovery and automated inventory updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced asset tracking, maintenance scheduling, license management, and integration with ticket system.

tasks.title: Notification System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing notification system with advanced features and delivery methods
tasks.details: Enhance the existing email and Socket.IO notification system with advanced features including configurable notification preferences, multiple delivery methods (email, SMS, push notifications), notification templates, and intelligent notification routing. Add notification history and delivery tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced notification system, delivery methods, and notification preferences functionality.

tasks.title: Advanced Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive search and filtering capabilities across all modules
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive search functionality across tickets, knowledge base, and assets with advanced filtering, sorting, and export capabilities. Add full-text search, faceted search, and search result highlighting. Include search analytics and user search behavior tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search accuracy, performance with large datasets, and search analytics functionality.

tasks.title: Security Hardening and Compliance
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive security measures and compliance standards
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive security measures including input validation, SQL injection prevention, XSS protection, CSRF tokens, rate limiting, secure file upload handling, and data encryption. Add security logging, audit trails, and compliance with data protection standards. Implement secure API endpoints and access controls.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform comprehensive security testing including penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and compliance audits.

subtasks.title: Input Validation and Sanitization
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive input validation, sanitization, and SQL injection prevention
subtasks.details: Add input validation middleware, sanitize user inputs, implement parameterized queries, and prevent SQL injection attacks

subtasks.title: XSS and CSRF Protection
subtasks.description: Implement XSS protection, CSRF tokens, and secure headers
subtasks.details: Add XSS protection middleware, implement CSRF token validation, set secure HTTP headers, and prevent cross-site scripting attacks

subtasks.title: Rate Limiting and Access Control
subtasks.description: Implement rate limiting, authentication, and authorization controls
subtasks.details: Add rate limiting middleware, implement role-based access control (RBAC), secure authentication, and prevent brute force attacks

subtasks.title: Secure File Upload and Data Encryption
subtasks.description: Implement secure file upload handling and data encryption
subtasks.details: Add secure file upload validation, implement data encryption for sensitive information, secure file storage, and prevent file-based attacks

subtasks.title: Security Logging and Audit Trails
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive security logging and audit trails
subtasks.details: Add security event logging, implement audit trails for user actions, create security monitoring dashboard, and ensure compliance with data protection standards

tasks.title: Performance Optimization and Monitoring
tasks.description: Optimize system performance and implement comprehensive monitoring
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive performance optimization including database query optimization, caching strategies, CDN integration, and performance monitoring. Add application performance monitoring (APM), error tracking, and system health monitoring. Optimize frontend loading times and API response times.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform comprehensive load testing, performance benchmarking, and verify monitoring system functionality.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive testing suite and quality assurance processes
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive testing suite including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and automated testing pipeline. Add code quality checks, linting, and continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipeline. Implement automated testing for all system components and ensure high test coverage.
tasks.testStrategy: Achieve high test coverage, implement CI/CD pipeline, and ensure all tests pass consistently.
